data.description:
Specializations: Particular ship type or class — Oceanic transport, coastal runabout, skiff, sailboat.

This skill allows characters to pilot naval ships and boats. While these vehicles are seldom used in the highertech worlds, many low-tech cultures use them for  transporting personnel and freight over bodies of water.

Note that aquatic vehicles which employ the use of repulsorlift or hover technology may also require the use of different skills (namely repulsorlift operation and hover vehicle operation).

Aquatic vehicle operation can be used for a vehicle dodge — a “reaction skill” — to avoid enemy fire.
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
